title: Secret Trails Frozen Heart Collectors Edition-Wendy99
description:
::::::: WENDY99 PRESENTS :::::::


:::: Secret Trails Frozen Heart Collectors Edition-Wendy99 ::::


::Information::


Secret Trails Frozen Heart Collectors Edition


Genre: Adventure | Hidden Object | Puzzle


Blooming spring has always been your favorite place to visit, not just because of the year-round sunny weather, but because your little sister Emma, calls it home. You're planning a secret visit for Emma's birthday, but your surprise is ruined by a freak blizzard in the middle of July! What caused this storm? And who is that suspicious man slinking around Emma's house? No sooner have you reunited with your sister than she is kidnapped. Rescue Emma and bring summer back to Blooming spring in Secret Trails: Frozen Heart, a gorgeous Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure game.


This is a special Collector's Edition release full of exclusive extras you won't find in the standard version.


The Collector's Edition includes:


Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Bonus chapter featuring an epilogue!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Exciting story with humor and character!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Collectible butterflies
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Beautiful graphics, music, concept art and wallpapers
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Strategy Guide


System Requirements:


OS: Windows XP | Windows Vista | Windows 7 | Windows 8
CPU: 1.4 GHz
RAM: 512 MB
DirectX: 9.0
Hard Drive: 1.15 GB
Browser: Internet Explorer 7 or later


Install and play!
